.st: Get Fortnite: Battle Royale player stats
.tweet: Get latest three tweets by Fortnite's official twitter handle
.ft: Get a random location to jump in Battle Royale map
.wlist: Get list of all available in-game weapons
.wstat: Get statsheet of a particular weapon. (Usage: .wstat weapon_rarity weapon_name)
.news: Get latest news about Fortnite: Battle Royale
.ch: Get the current week Battle Royale challenges
NOTE:: This bot is a work in progress
